string.name: app_name
string.description: Name of the Paco app used on the Home Screen and other places [No Translation]

string.name: server
string.description: default server address for Paco[No Translation]

string.name: app_package
string.description: unique Android package name[No Translation]

string.name: contact_email
string.description: contact email address [No Translation]

string.name: about_googlegroups
string.description: user group email address [No Translation]

string.name: usergroup_website
string.description: Website for user group [No Translation]

string.name: about_weburl
string.description: Home page url [No Translation]

string.description: [No Translation]

string.description: [No Translation]

string.description: [No Translation]

string.name: about_team
string.description: Label for list of team members

string.name: about_version
string.description: Detail label for Paco version

string.name: welcome_about
string.description: button label to go to Paco version information

string.name: eula_title
string.description: Title in screen showing EULA

string.name: decline
string.description: Shown to user to decline the EULA

string.name: no
string.description: Dialog Button Label

string.name: yes
string.description: Dialog Button Label to agree with presented content

string.name: ok
string.description: Dialog Button Label to accept presented content

string.name: success
string.description: Confirmation text usually shown in brief messages after user action completes.

string-array.name: repeat_range
string-array.description: List selection choices for number of days between repeating schedules

string-array.name: days_of_week
string-array.description: Days of week used in schedule editor

string-array.name: nth_of_month
string-array.description: Ordinal numbers for which week of the month in schedule editing

string.name: explore_data
string.description: Label for menu item to see recorded data

string.name: current_account
string.description: Label for value of user's currently chosen Google Account

string.name: experiment_refresh
string.description: Menu item to cause refresh of the definitions of running experiments from the server.

string.name: checking_server_for_new_and_updated_experiment_definitions
string.description: Message about current work of app, namely checking for new and updated experiment definitions

resources.string: Checking Server for New and Updated Experiment Definitions

string.name: selected_experiment_not_on_phone_refresh
string.description: Message shown to user trying to join an experiment that is not known to the phone but that might be on the server.

resources.string: Selected Experiment does not exist on the phone. Refresh Experiments from Server?

string.name: link_wrong
string.description: Message shown to user trying to join experiment from a link in another app but it is not a Paco link

resources.string: Make sure you are using the right link.

string.name: ongoing_duration
string.description: Label for a schedule that runs in perpetuity

string.name: day_esm_period
string.description: List choice for schedule signal period - randomly every day

string.name: week_esm_period
string.description: List choice for schedule signal period - randomly every week

string.name: month_esm_period
string.description: List choice for schedule signal period - randomly very month

string.name: daily_schedule_type
string.description: List choice for schedule that signals - fixed time every day

string.name: weekdays_schedule_type
string.description: List choice for schedule that signals - fixed time on weekdays

string.name: weekly_schedule_type
string.description: List choice for schedule that signals - fixed time every week

string.name: monthly_schedule_type
string.description: List choice for schedule that signals - fixed time every month

string.name: random_sampling_esm_schedule_type
string.description: List choice for schedule type - random signaling (ESM=Experiential Sampling Method)

string.name: self_report_only_schedule_type
string.description: List choice for schedule that does not signal. User initiates response.

string.name: advanced_schedule_type
string.description: List choice for schedule that signals in custom, advanced ways

string.name: survey_expired
string.description: Message to user that the signal to which they were responding has expired and there is no work to be done.

resources.string: This survey request has expired. No need to enter a response

string.name: gps_message
string.description: Message to user to enable GPS location, but only when outside.

string.name: enable_button
string.description: Dialog Button label to enable GPS

string.name: cancel_button
string.description: Dialog Button label to cancel GPS

string.name: need_location
string.description: Message to user about need to enable location services

resources.string: "You must enable some form of Location Service if you want to include location data. "

string.name: required_answers_missing
string.description: Message shown to user submitting a form without filling in required fields.

string.name: must_answer
string.description: Label for error dialog listing which fields are required

string.name: about_paco_menu_item
string.description: Menu Item text for About screens

string.name: eula_menu_item
string.description: Menu Item to see user agreement text

string.name: debug_menu_item
string.description: Menu Item to debug app

string.name: select_signal_tone
string.description: Title of dialog box letting user select the Signaling Audio tone for Paco notifications

string.name: cannot_find_the_experiment_warning
string.description: Error message shown to users when trying to load a specific experiment

string.name: save_button
string.description: Label on button shown to user on survey form

string.name: start_time_title
string.description: Label for schedule editing field that sets the start of the window for scheduling

string.name: end_time_title
string.description: Label for schedule editing field that sets the end of the window for scheduling

string.name: modify_time_title
string.description: Dialog Box title for editing a schedule time

string.name: days_of_week_title
string.description: Dialog Box title for editing days of the week to schedule

string.name: start_hour_must_be_before_end_hour_warning
string.description: Error message when edited start time is after end time

resources.string: Start hour must be before end hour

string.name: show_trends_button
string.description: Button label for chart that turns on a trend line

string.name: make_selections
string.description: Button label for list questionss that allow multiple selections

string.name: edit_schedule_menu_item
string.description: Menu Item to edit schedule

string.name: stop_experiment_menu_item
string.description: Menu Item to stop an experiment

string.name: explore_data_menu_item
string.description: Menu Item to explore data collected for an experiment

string.name: running_experiments_title
string.description: Nav Drawer label for Running Experiments (Main) Screen

string.name: completed_experiments_title
string.description: Nav Drawer label for Finished Experiments Screen

string.name: find_public_experiments_title
string.description: Nav Drawer label for Experiment Hub Screen (publicly available experiments)

string.name: stop_the_experiment_dialog_title
string.description: Title of dialog confirming that user wants to stop the experiment

string.name: stop_experiment_dialog_body
string.description: Body of dialog confirming that user wants to stop the experiment

resources.string: Are you sure you want to stop the experiment?

string.name: unknown_author_text
string.description: Default text in experiment definition when author of experiment is unspecified

string.name: retrieving_lat_lon
string.description: Placeholder label in survey form while retrieving lat/lon coordinates

string.name: missing_image_warning
string.description: Error message when the camera app did not produce a file.

resources.string: Cannot find image file from camera!

string.name: unknown_location
string.description: Label used in survey form when a location is unavailable

string.name: cannot_open_camera_warning
string.description: Error message when survey cannot open the Camera app

string.name: done_button
string.description: Button label in dialog where user selects multiple options from a list. Signifies that they are done and closes dialog.

string.name: time_to_participate_notification_text
string.description: Default message for Experiment Notifications

string.name: time_for_notification_title
string.description: Default ticker text for Experiment Notification. Experiment name is appended to this.

string.name: refresh_experiment_menu_item
string.description: Menu item to refresh running experiments

string.name: main_page_menu_item
string.description: Menu item to return to the main screen.

string.name: missed_signal_value
string.description: Label for signaled response that was not answered before it timed out.

string.name: choose_account
string.description: Instruction text for choosing a Google Account to use in Paco

resources.string: Please Choose an Account to use with Paco

string.name: daily_scheduled_times_for
string.description: Prefix title for screen that shows daily scheduled times for an experiment. Experiment name is appended.

string.name: scheduled_times
string.description: Label for list of scheduled times in experiment

string.name: experiment_name
string.description: Default placeholder for Experiment name while loading real data

string.name: suggested_signalling_schedule
string.description: Label for screen for editing default schedule

string.name: schedule_period
string.description: Label for choosing ESM schedule period (day, week, month)

string.name: times_per_period
string.description: Label for entering integer value for frequency of ESM signals (# of times per day, wk, mo)

string.name: weekends
string.description: Label for checkbox to configure whether signaling happens on weekends as well as weekdays.

string.name: start_hour
string.description: Label for time picker that sets the starting time of day for an esm schedule

string.name: default_start_time
string.description: String value of default start time for esm schedule

string.name: end_hour
string.description: Label for time picker that sets the ending time of day for an esm schedule

string.name: default_end_hour
string.description: String value of default end time for esm schedule

string.name: responses
string.description: Label for table of users' survey responses

string.name: no_data
string.description: Default list value for ui elements that show lists of data

string.name: description
string.description: Label for field showing experiment's description on Experiment details page.

string.name: schedule
string.description: Label for showing a schedule summary in Experiment details page

string.name: start_date
string.description: Label for experiment start date in experiment details page

string.name: end_date
string.description: Label for experiment end date in experiment details page

string.name: esm_frequency
string.description: Label for esm frequency in experiment details page

string.name: scheduled_time
string.description: Label for list of scheduled times in experiment details page

string.name: creator
string.description: Label for creator of experiment in experiment details page

string.name: join_this_experiment
string.description: Label for button to join experiment in experiment details page

string.name: raw_data_button_text
string.description: Label for button to go to view of raw data collected

string.name: your_current_experiments
string.description: Title for list of currently running experiments

string.name: load_more_experiments_from_server
string.description: Popup message telling user how to load more experiments into a list

resources.string: Refresh Again to Load More Experiments from Server

string.name: data_handling_title
string.description: Title of Informed Consent Screen

resources.string: You Agree to Share Information with the Experimenters

string.name: informed_consent_preamble
string.description: Text on infomrmed consent screen instruction to the participant to read the experimenter-provided data handling policy

resources.string: By joining this experiment, you will be sharing your responses with the creator and administrators of this experiment, and they may use that information for research, product development, or other purposes. Please read the privacy policy or data handling statement they have provided below to decide whether you want to participate in this experiment.

string.name: consent_checkbox_text
string.description: Label for button to consent to experiment's data policies.

string.name: available_experiments
string.description: Title for list of experiments (retrieved from server) that can be joined by user

string.name: retrieving_location
string.description: Status message for retrieving location

string.name: location_settings
string.description: Label for button to take user to system location settings

string.name: daily_scheduled_time_for
string.description: Title for list of daily times in schedule edit screen

string.name: by_day_of_month
string.description: List choice for monthly schedule type (choose by day of the month)

string.name: by_day_of_week
string.description: List choice for monthly schedule type (choose by day of the week)

string.name: day_of_month
string.description: Label for list picker of day of month (1..31)

string.name: day_of_week
string.description: Label for widget to pick day of week (smtwrfs)

string.name: take_picture
string.description: Button label for taking a picture with the camera app as part of a survey

string.name: repeat_every_
string.description: Label for list to pick how many days between signal repeats on a schedule

string.name: days
string.description: List choice for period of ESM schedule

string.name: months
string.description: List choice for period of ESM schedule

string.name: weeks
string.description: List choice for period of ESM schedule

string.name: days_of_week
string.description: Label for schedule edit for weekly schedule

string.name: this_experiment_is_self_reporting_only
string.description: Message to let user know that this experiment is self-report or signals upon a trigger. There is no schedule for them to configure.

resources.string: This experiment is not scheduled. It is self report or triggered.

string.name: server_address_warning
string.description: Warning message to user about modifying server address setting

resources.string: WARNING: Only change this if you know what you are doing.

string.name: enter_server_address
string.description: Label for text field to edit server address for Paco

string.name: no_accounts_found
string.description: Error message to help user login to Paco.

resources.string: No Google accounts on your phone. Go to Settings/Account to add one.

string.name: default_list_item
string.description: Initial choice in a survey list question. Instructs the user to pick one of the subsequent choices.

string.name: retrieving_your_joined_experiment_from_the_server
string.description: Message about status of fully loading an experiment once user has consented to join.

resources.string: Retrieving Your Joined Experiment From the Server

string.name: experiment_retrieval
string.description: Title for a dialog while downloading an experiment

string.name: experiment_could_not_be_retrieved
string.description: Title for dialog informing user that experiment requested could not be retrieved.

string.name: invalid_data
string.description: Error message that experiment requested could not be retrieved.

resources.string: Something went wrong with retrieving experiment data.

string.name: unable_to_save_experiment
string.description: Body of message informing user that something prevented them from joining the experiment.

resources.string: Unable to join this experiment. Please email the researcher running this study.

string.name: server_error
string.description: Catch-all for server side error during network communication

resources.string: Something went wrong with the server.

string.name: network_required
string.description: Title of dialog that tells the user that some form of networking is necessary to complete the operation

string.name: unknown_host
string.description: Title of dialog that tells the user that Server address is not reachable

resources.string: Unknown or unreachable server address. Check your Paco settings.

string.name: need_network_connection
string.description: body of dialog telling the user network connection is necessary to complete the operation

resources.string: You will need a network connection to join the experiment. Enable connection now?

string.name: no_thanks
string.description: Choice in dialogs to not pursue options presented.

string.name: go_to_network_settings
string.description: Button label to jump to OS settings for networking

string.name: last_refreshed
string.description: Label for timestamp indicating when experiment lists were last loaded from server.

string.name: answer_by_speaking
string.description: Assistive popup text for microphone button

string.name: oops_your_device_doesn_t_support_speech_to_text
string.description: Error message shown to user in dialog when Speech to text is unavailable on their phone

resources.string: Oops! Your device doesn\'t support Speech to Text

string.name: updating_your_joined_experiments_from_the_server
string.description: Dialog message showing progress refreshing running (joined) experiments from the server

resources.string: Updating Your Joined Experiments From the Server

string.name: please_choose_the_source_of_your_image
string.description: Prompt text for photo input survey item indicating that user should choose from Camera or Gallery as the source

resources.string: Please choose the source of your image

string.name: camera
string.description: Label for button to choose the Camera as the source for inputing a photo into a survey

string.name: gallery
string.description: Label for button to choose the Photo Gallery app as the source for inputing a photo into a survey

string.name: action_find_experiments
string.decsription: Label for button to go to find experiments screen

string.name: action_settings
string.description: Label for Menu/Toolbar action to go to Settings screen

string.description: Label for Menu/Toolbar action to go to Language Preferences screen

string.description: Label for Menu/Toolbar action to go to troubleshooting screen

string.name: action_user_guide
string.description: Label for Menu/Toolbar action to go to User Guide screen

string.name: action_email_paco_team
string.description: Label for Menu/Toolbar action to go email Paco team

string.name: action_about
string.description: Label for Menu/Toolbar action to go to About screen

string.name: action_user_agreement
string.description: Label for Menu/Toolbar action to go to User Agreement screen

string.name: action_open_source_libs
string.description: Label for Menu/Toolbar action to go to Open source libraries screen

string.name: find_my_experiments
string.description: Nav Drawer label for Experiments Invitations Screen

string.name: find_all_public_experiments
string.description: Label for button to go to Find Public Experiment screen

string.name: could_not_load_full_experiment_
string.description: Error message for retrieving the full definition of an experiment when trying to join

string.name: no_more_experiments_on_server
string.description: Progress dialog message indicating that the user has loaded all the experiments available on the server

string.name: this_experiment_schedule_is_not_editable
string.description: Status message to indicate to user entering the Edit Schedule screens that this experiment's schedule is not editable.

resources.string: This experiment schedule is not editable

string.name: multiselectListManyItemsChosen
string.description: Label for multi-select list button indicating that more than one item is currently chosen

string.name: multiselectListOneItemChosen
string.description: Label for multi-select list button indicating that one item is currently chosen

string.name: i_did_not_understand
string.description: Error message shown to user in dialog box when speech to text failed

string.name: types_of_data_collected
string.description: Section label above a list of data types that the experiment collects

string.name: experiment_informed_consent
string.description: Label above experimenter-provided informed consent information

string.name: survey_responses_data_collected
string.description: List choice for type of data that will be collected in an experiment corresponding to their survey responses

string.name: app_usage_and_browser_usage_data_collected
string.description: List choice for type of data that will be collected in an experiment corresponding to the collection of the names of the apps they use and the websites they visit while in the experiment

resources.string: Apps and sites used during experiment

string.name: accessibility_logging
string.description: List choice for type of data that will be collected in an experiment corresponding to accessibility events

resources.string: For some specific screens: text on screen during the event

string.name: installed_app_data_collected
string.description: List choice for type of dta that will be collected in an experiment corresponding to names of the apps installed on their phone

string.name: accessibility_rationale
string.description: Message shown to the user when toggling the accessibility permission for Paco

resources.string: This permission is needed for Paco to be able to read text that is on the screen and detect click events.

string.name: navigation_drawer_open
string.description: Accessibility label for Navigation Drawer indicating that it can be opened

string.name: navigation_drawer_close
string.description: Accessibility label for Navigation Drawer indicating that it can be closed

string.name: choose_experiment_group
string.description: Label over a list of experiment groups (different surveys) within an experiment prompting user to pick one to respond to its survey items

resources.string: Choose an Experiment Group to Respond

string.name: title_activity_settings
string.description: Title lable for the Settings screen

string.name: title_activity_find_my_Experiments
string.description: Title lable for the Invitations screen

string.name: title_activity_experiment_detail
string.description: Title lable for the Screen to join a specific Experiment

string.name: title_activity_Informed_consent
string.description: Title lable for the screen to accept the informed consent from an experiment

string.name: location_to_be_recorded_default_prompt
string.description: Default prompt text for a location input survey item. This is shown next to the lat/long retrieved and the button to modify location settings

string.name: organization
string.description: Label for field showing the organization that is offering the experiment

string.name: contact_
string.description: Label for the field showing the contact email address for the experiment

string.name: done_joining_button
string.description: Label for button to complete the experiment join process

string.name: save_response
string.description: Button label for survey form to save answers

string.name: email_subject_paco_feedback
string.description: This is the subject line inserted into the email message when a user chooses Email Paco Team

string.name: could_not_successfully_join_try_again_
string.description: Error message on joining experiment. This is transient so ask them to try again.

resources.string: Could not successfully join. Try again.

string.name: experiment_list_download_complete
string.description: Message shown to users when all experiments have been retrieved from server.

string.name: could_not_retrieve_experiments_try_again_
string.description: Error message shown to user when experiment list could not be retrieved.

resources.string: Could not retrieve experiments. Try again.

string.name: by
string.description: connector for showing the organization that is offering this experiment, e.g, 'by Google'

string.name: joined_on
string.description: Text shown in experiment card that lists when the user joined the experiment, e.g., 'Joined on August 5th'

string.name: you_must_pick_an_account
string.description: Message to user that they must choose a Google account to proceed.

string.name: are_not_available_
string.description: Appended to message about necessary 3rd party components, e.g., 'GooglePlayServices are not available'

string.name: error
string.description: Label for an error message that is appended, e.g., 'ERROR: service not installed'

string.name: no_photo_support
string.description: error message shown in survey form when the platform does not support photos

string.name: no_notification_support
string.description: error message shown when the platform running the experiment does not provide notification facilities

string.name: thank_you_for_participating
string.decription: Message shown when user submits form

string.name: maps_button_label
string.description: label for button to see maps

string.name: data_storage_error
string.description: error message shown responses could not be stored.

resources.string: Could not store data. You might try again. Or contact the researcher running the study.

string.name: empty_response_error
string.decription: error message shown when user submits without answering any questions

resources.string: You cannot submit an empty response.

string.name: already_replied
string.description: Message shown to user when they have already followed up on a daily response

string.name: exit_with_unsubmitted_work_confirmation
string.description: Message shown to confirm that user wants to leave unfinished work

resources.string: You have not submitted the work on this page. Are you sure to leave this page?
You have not submitted responses for all daily events. Are you sure you want to leave?

string.name: no_active_responses
string.description: Message shown when user has no work to do

string.name: exit
string.description: button label to exit work flow

string.name: submit
string.description: button label to submit current part of work

string.name: bad_value
string.description: error message shown when entering a non-numerical value into a number field

string.name: could_not_initialize_experiment
string.decsription: Status message shown when an experimnt is malformed - should only show up for researchers

string.name: chart_button_label
string.description: Label for button to go see charts of data for a variable

string.name: no_answer_label
string.description: Label for data presentation field when no answer was recorded in the data set

string.name: no_data_found
string.description: Shown when trying to plot data but there is no data recorded

string.name: responses_at_location_title
string.description: Title for list of responses for a given lat/long location

string.name: unchartable_error
string.description: message shown when the data type is not a location

string.name: end_of_study_prompt
string.description: text shown to prompt user to do end of study activity

resources.string: Please do the End of Study Sorting Activity sometime in the next 24 hours

string.name: eos_early_exit_warning
string.description: warn user that they might lose unfinished work if the exit now

resources.string: If you have not submitted, you may lose data. Are you sure you want to leave?

string.name: eos_could_not_save
string.description: message shown when user's responses in end of study activity could not be saved

resources.string: Could not store your response. You might try again. Or contact the researcher running the study. Error:

string.name: eos_instructions
string.description: Text instructing user to sort activities into groups

resources.string: Please group info needs into higher-level activities
Enter a label for the larger activity and press Group
Repeat until all info needs that were part of a bigger activity have been grouped

string.name: eos_activity_field_label
string.description: label for text field where user gives group a name

string.name: eos_group_button_label
string.description: button label for group button to group activities under new name

string.name: eos_created_activity_group_section_header
string.description: Label for list of activity groups created by the user

resources.string: We are grateful for their contributions.
Something happened.\\nWe could not load the experiment.\\nPlease exit and email the researcher running the experiment
Make sure Paco has accessibility permissions by clicking here
Make sure Paco has app usage access by clicking here
Login with your Google email to join experiments
Could not encode the audio file
Changing your email address may prevent you from finding experiments or uploading data on existing experiments
End time must be after start time
Start and End time window is too short
